name: Room Runner!
description:
This is prototype of a game im working on! It's a simple platforming game with a simple objective. You have 10 seconds to get to the end of the level. Get to the end of the level before time runs out! Collect power ups to help you on the way! There are currently 3 levels, but im putting the prototype online just to test the waters. Im planning on adding about 60 or so levels. I would appreciate it if you checked it out, and gave feed back. There might be a few glitches and an issue with the smoke particle effect. If you see any bugs or have any suggestions, then tell me in the comments. 

Update 1.0

I fixed a few bugs in the prototype. Check the devlog for the Patch Notes
